Title: The Nest of the Turtledove
Writer: Olga Kozarevska (translation), Olha Lytovchenko (translation), Vasyl Melnyk, Jared Morgan (translation), Taras Tkachenko (screenplay)
Actors: Rimma Zyubina, Vitaliy Linetskiy, Mauro Cipriani, Lina Bernardi
Plot: A Ukrainian woman comes back to her native village leaving her working life in Italy behind.
